name: Document.onfullscreenerror
description: The Document.onfullscreenerror property is an event handler for the fullscreenerror event that is sent to the  document when it fails to transition into full-screen mode after a prior call to Element.requestFullscreen().

refs.name: Fullscreen API
refs.description: The definition of 'onfullscreenerror' in Fullscreen API.
